name: Easy Toolbar Visibility
author: Md Akash Ahmed

sections.description:
Easy Toolbar Visibility WordPress plugin enables site administrators to control the visibility of the WordPress toolbar based on user roles. This plugin has the ability to show or hide the WordPress toolbar based on user roles while they are visiting the website as logged in.

ðŸ”¥FREE FEATURES:

  • Subscribers: Show/Hide WordPress Toolbar for Subscribers while they are interacting with the website as logged in.
  • Contributors: Show/Hide WordPress Toolbar for Contributors while they are interacting with the website as logged in.
  • Authors: Show/Hide WordPress Toolbar for Authors while they are interacting with the website as logged in.
  • Editors: Show/Hide WordPress Toolbar for Editors while they are interacting with the website as logged in.
  • Administrators: Show/Hide WordPress Toolbar for Administrators while they are interacting with the website as logged in.

ðŸ“š How to use

You can use this plugin with some steps, like:

  1. Install the Plugin:
  • Go to your WordPress dashboard.
  • Navigate to “Plugins” > “Add New”.
  • Search for the plugin that allows you to manage the toolbar visibility.
  • Click “Install Now” and then “Activate”.
  1. Access the Plugin Settings:
  • Once the plugin is activated, go to the plugin settings. This can usually be found under “Settings” or in a dedicated menu item in the dashboard.
  1. Configure Toolbar Visibility:
  • In the plugin settings, you will find options to show or hide the WordPress Toolbar for different user roles:
    • Subscribers: Toggle the option to show or hide the toolbar for subscribers.
    • Contributors: Toggle the option to show or hide the toolbar for contributors.
    • Authors: Toggle the option to show or hide the toolbar for authors.
    • Editors: Toggle the option to show or hide the toolbar for editors.
    • Administrators: Toggle the option to show or hide the toolbar for administrators.

  1. Save Changes:

    • After configuring the toolbar visibility for each user role according to your preferences, make sure to save the changes.

  2. Verify the Changes:

    • Log in with different user roles to verify that the toolbar visibility settings are working as intended.
sections.faq:
01. Does Easy Toolbar Visibility works with all WordPress themes?

Yes.
